ygData.subject: Re: Shadowstepping out of zones
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, that would be pretty cool if SS eventually got to the point where it would juxt zone you.  My guess is it just dumped you right on the border resulting in
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, that would be pretty cool if SS eventually got to the point where it
would juxt zone you. My guess is it just dumped you right on the border
resulting in an automatic zone.
----- Original Message -----
From: Marten Ekvall <marten@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 6:08 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Shadowstepping out of zones


> From: Marten Ekvall <marten@...>
>
> Anyone else out there who have experienced this:
> I resently practiced my Shadowstep near a zone border, jumping
> everywhere. Suddenly I found myself on the other side of the
> zone border (after the usual load). This happened to me near
> the border to Kerra from Tox.
>
> Regards
> Nywon, Tunare
>
